Description: Updated 3-level townhouse with dual master suites! Main level features hardwood floors half bath & kitchen leading to a large deck. Dual master suites upstairs each with private bath.Lower level walkout with fireplace full bath and separate laundry room. Fully fenced backyard that backs to trees and walking path. Near Colonnade at Union Mill - shopping & restaurants! No pets.

Description: Perfectly located sought-after The Ponds of Clifton 2 bedrooms 1 bath contemporary style condo. fitness center clubhouse meeting and conference facility. Just outside are picnic / BBQ areas tennis courts a swimming pool and a playground . Convenient to shopping parks transportation hiking bike paths I-66 Rt.28 and Rt. 29.
